brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts peer-to-peer networking. Two PC's are connected via a switch. PC peer 1 has files to share. PC peer 2 has a shared printer attached.

PC Peer 1: Print client, file server. The conversation bubble states: "I will share a file that I have stored on my hard drive. Can you print the directions?"

PC Peer 2: Print server, file client. The conversation bubble states: "Yes. Send over the page to print and I will print. Meanwhile, I will access a file from your drive."

Caption text: In a peer-to-peer exchange, both devices are considered equal in the communication process.
